content:
Hi, I would like to validate my generated FHIR IPS Bundle against a profile, to check if it is a valid FHIR document. Is there an official IPS Bundle profile provided, which can be used? :)
I found this profile here, but I'm not sure if it is an official one:
https://simplifier.net/trilliumii/patientsummarybundle-uv-trillium2
Thanks in advance!
The link you are referring to is a non-updated version of the Trillium II project profiles.
there is not a Bundle profile in the IPS published guide.
... but you can find one in the on-develop version..
thanks for the fast reply! where exacly can I find this version?
Except that one doesn't have the Bundle profile.

That is in the even more updated connectathon branch, which is here:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/branches/connectathon/profiles.html
We're working on getting an STU update ready, so there are a few moving parts. :)
very cool! will be using the one from the connectathon branch til then :) definitly helps a lot, thanks!
I should be pushing some new updates to the connectathon branch probably within the next 24-48 hours.
